name: droidtechknow-dashboard
description: This app is used to fill the entries into mysql databases.

scripts.git: git add public/static && git commit -m 'update bundle file' && git push origin build && git checkout master
scripts.publish: git checkout build && git rebase master && git push origin build -f && npm run build --deployUrl='static/' --prefix frontend/ && npm run git

author: Gulfam Ansari
